snippet: “The Killer Speaks” and “Cell Block Psychic” address real murders, not the glossy TV kind.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger Critic's Notebook column examines A&E series The Killer Speaks and Investigation Discovery series Cell Block Psychic, noting that both address real-life murders, rather than the glossy kind common to TV dramas.
lead_paragraph: “The Killer Speaks” and “Cell Block Psychic” address real murders, not the glossy TV kind.

headline.print_headline: Murderers Are Shown With Warts Aplenty
headline.seo: Real Murder in ‘The Killer Speaks’ and ‘Cell Block Psychic’
headline.main: Murderers Are Shown With Warts Aplenty
